title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama repository: lightweight, extensible framework for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other open LLMs locally on macOS, Linux, and Windows.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, published on npm as 'ollama'.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, available on PyPI as 'ollama'.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama, letting LangChain apps call local Ollama models.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama, supports multi-model chats, file uploads, RAG.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive CLI wrapper for Ollama with conversation history & syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into inline code copilots.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB for Q&A over documents.

title: ollama-node
summary: Community-maintained Node.js client for Ollama with ESM/CJS dual builds.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app template that connects to local Ollama models.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes clusters with GPU support.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-go
summary: Go client library for Ollama with context cancellation and streaming support.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-host Discord bot that answers users via Ollama models.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django app + REST API for serving Ollama models behind authentication & per-user quotas.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app that brings Ollama completions into Slack channels/threads.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLM prompts inside notes via Ollama.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package for Ollama JavaScript/TypeScript client (mirror of ollama-js repo).

title: ollama-pypi
summary: Official PyPI package for Ollama Python client (mirror of ollama-python repo).

title: r/ollama - Reddit community
summary: Active subreddit for sharing models, tips, and integrations around Ollama.
